testsuite.name: tests.SD5_Verify_multiple_items_cart

testcase.name: test_Verify_multiple_items_cart
testcase.system-out: 1. Complete a successful login Navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/ Element clicked Successfully Signed In with the STANDARD account 2. Add saucelabs backpack to cart Product Sauce Labs Backpack added to test session Element clicked Sauce Labs backpack added to cart. 3. Add saucelabs bike light to cart Product Sauce Labs Bike Light added to test session Element clicked Sauce Labs bicke light added to cart. 4. Click cart button Element clicked 5. verify url changes to '/cart.html' Page navigated to /cart.html 6. verify there are 2 items in the cart page 7. verify both product names and prices are in the cart page Cart page products names and prices initialized. Gathering cart products... Gathering cart products... Items added to cart from inventory page gathered from session. Cart page products names and prices gathered. Amount of items in cart and items in session matched. Products added in inventory page present in cart page.
